text: George Henry Sanders (3 July 1906 â€“ 25 April 1972) was a British actor and singer whose career spanned over 40 years. He was known for his roles in All About Eve, Rebecca, and The Jungle Book. He was also known for his television role as Mr. Freeze in Batman. His brother was actor Tom Conway. He won an Academy Award. Sanders was born on 3 July 1906, in Saint Petersburg, Russian Empire"George Sanders (July 3, 1906 - April 25, 1972)." George Sanders: Official Site. Retrieved: 8 December 2011. to English parents. Sanders was raised in Brighton, Sussex, England. He studied at Brighton College and at Manchester Technical College. Sanders was married to Susan Larson from 1940 until they divorced in 1949. He was married to Zsa Zsa Gabor from 1949 until they divorced in 1954. Then he was married to Benita Hume from 1959 until they divorced in 1967. He was last married to Magda Gabor from 1970 until they divorced in 1971. He was partners with Lorraine Chanel from 1968 until his death in 1972. He had no children. Sanders committed suicide using barbiturates on April 25, 1972, in his hotel room in Castelldefels, Barcelona, Spain. His cremated ashes were scattered at the English Channel. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1906 births Category:1972 deaths Category:British Academy Award winning actors Category:Actors from Sussex Category:Drug-related suicides Category:English movie actors Category:English radio actors Category:English singer-songwriters Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:Entertainers from Brighton Category:Writers from Sussex
title: George Sanders
